aboutme.title: About Me
aboutme.text:
I am a Software Engineering student at the Federal Institute of Paraná and hold a technical diploma in Information Technology from the same institution.

I have been studying programming since 2020 and have practical experience with Java, Node.js, PHP, MySQL, and React. Currently, I am dedicating myself to learning Node.js libraries and frameworks such as Express.js, Electron, and Next.js.

bs.title: B.S. Software Engineering
bs.text:
Federal Institute of Paraná - IFPR

2024 - 2027 | In Progress

redesocial.title: Social Network - Final Paper
redesocial.text: A social network project developed in PHP, Bootstrap, jQuery and MySQL. The project was developed for my final paper in IT Technician course.

store.title: Store Management System
store.text: A store management system developed with React, Express.js and MySQL. The system can be used to manage inventory, sales, customers, run reports and more.

cc.title: CaminhoCurto - Link Shortener
cc.text: A simple link shortener, that transforms long and confusing links into a short link, that can be easily shared. Made using React, Express.js and MySQL, to study the technologies involved.

footer.text: Made with by Luan Gabriel © 2024

redesocial.title: Social Network - Final Paper
redesocial.text:
This project was developed for my final paper in the IT Technician course, it is a social network with the possibility of creating posts, commenting, liking, following users, customizing the profile and more.

The front-end was developed using jQuery and Bootstrap, the back-end was developed with PHP and MySQL for the database, the communication between the front-end and the back-end was done using an API developed with PHP.

With this project I was able to learn a lot about the technologies used, and I was able to develop a complete system, with a front-end, back-end and database, and learn about how social networks work.

Professor: Ph.D. Fabiano Utiyama

store.title: Store Management System
store.text:
This is a system for managing a store, with the possibility of managing products, sales and customers, and also running reports. It was developed using the React framework for the frontend, Express.js for the backend, MySQL for the database and Node.js for the server.

This project was developed only for study purposes of the technologies used, it is simple and does not have all the necessary features for a real system.

cc.title: CaminhoCurto - Link Shortener
cc.text: A simple link shortener, made with React, Express.js and MySQL to study the technologies involved.
